name: Tip the Scales
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
When you cast this spell, you gain three charges. As a response to any roll from any creature you can see, you can add or subtract 5 from that roll at the cost of one charge.

Affected creatures are unaware of your influence.

You can't cast this spell again until you finish a rest.
empower: The number of charges increases to five.
